item.title: Changes in RHEL 7 Security Technical Implementation Guide Version 1, Release 3
item.description: The latest release of the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG) was published last week.

item.title: Apply the STIG to even more operating systems with ansible-hardening
item.description: Tons of improvements made their way into the ansible-hardening role in preparation for the OpenStack Pike release next month.
